DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized controlled clinical unicentric study, in ICU, Cannulation of the subclavian venous and examination guided with ultrasound
DOC.brief_title: SUBclavian Central Venous Catheters Guidance and Examination by UltraSound
DOC.detailed_description: One groupe : Ultrasound guided for cannulation and examination of absence ofcomplications One groupe : landmark method and examination with chest radiography
DOC.criteria: adults patients requiring subclavian vein cannulation patient covered by french health care system patient refusal requiring vein cannulation femoral or jugular we see nothing with echocardiography children and not adult patients
